segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen feels lived-in and real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is methodically wiping down her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink betrays her with its overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling on the tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are exploiting the distraction perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced precariously, snatching from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs splayed, on the verge of collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's expectant pose shows their shared secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit endearing, their little conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the slippery floor adds real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back at the window let in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden path looks inviting, escape from the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll catch them in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
